name: Traffic Flow (Rewzu)
description:
Traffic Flow is a Compo game made for Ludum Dare 51.

Drive an (almost) unstoppable truck.

How to play:
  • Destroy cars.
  • Try to destroy many cars in a row.
  • Avoid missiles.
  • Missiles launch every 10 seconds.
  • Driving off-road slows you down.
  • Have fun!
Default controls:
  • W/Up Arrow - Move forward
  • S/Down Arrow - Move backward
  • A/Left Arrow - Turn left
  • D/Right Arrow - Turn right
Have fun!
